name: A Modern European Breakfast by chef Clive Fernandes
description: About the MealThis is not your ordinary breakfast menu. It’s for diners looking to try something novel. Inspired by my time at Toronto’s famed Auberge du Pommier and paying homage to their chef patrons, this menu is crafted with carefully sourced ingredients and modern culinary techniques. Chef Clive Fernandes believes food should go beyond sustenance—it should be an experience. Keeping his core philosophy of simplicity and originality in mind, he crafts dishes that are both familiar yet progressive. What sets your brand apart: Oxalis brings modern European gastronomy to the city; no compromises, no shortcuts—just pure, unadulterated, and modern flavors. At Oxalis, we leave no stone unturned when it comes to ingredients used in each dish, delivering high-end artistic plates and an elevated dining experience.MENUNON VEGETARIAN SAUCISSON EN BRIOCHE - Rs. 595Polish Pork Sausage, Brioche, PortSTEAK & EGGS - Rs. 595Coffee Tenderloin, Onsen Egg, Pomme Persillade (Gluten- free)SAUMON - Rs. 665Fennel Cured Salmon, WHipped Horseradish Crème, Rye ToastPASTRAMI DE CANARD - Rs. 630Smoked Muscovy Duck, Butternut Squash, Preserved Berries, BaguetteBACON PAIN PERDU - Rs. 595Spice Roasted. Plums, Creme Fraiche, Grape Molasses, Bacon Lardon, BriocheQUICHE LORRAINE - Rs. 560Asparagus, Shucked Peas, Parmesan, Pork Ham, Confit OnionVEGETARIAN WILD & TAME MUSHROOM TARTINE - Rs. 490Mushroom Mascarpone Pâté, Purslane, PicklesPANISSE - Rs. 455Torched Cauliflower, Root Vegetable Ketchup, Espelette Harissa, Chickpea Crumble (vegan, gluten- free)POMME ALIGOT FOUGASSE - Rs. 539Braised Breadfruit & Jackfruit, Swiss Cheese Aligot, Espelette Puffed Quinoa & PotatoRIZ AU LAIT - Rs. 490Rice pudding, Pecan Pralines, Caramel Mousse (vegan, gluten-free)Terms and Conditions : The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventDo not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.Children aged 7 and above require a ticket to attend the meal. If you are bringing a child under 7, please inform us in advance, as we do not have a baby seat at the venue.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Management will entertain no liability or claims arising due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

name: The Wonder Years with chefs Ralph & Picu
description: Join us for an unforgettable evening celebrating the rich culinary heritage of Goa with two best friends turned culinary stars, Chef Picu and Chef Ralph. These two chefs, now at the forefront of the Goan food scene, have been inseparable since childhood, sharing a bond forged in the vibrant streets of Panjim.This special dinner menu is an ode to their enduring friendship and the city that has been its backdrop. The dishes showcase the European techniques they've mastered throughout their culinary journeys. The fusion of Portuguese and local influences that define Goan cuisine is beautifully reflected in every bite, each with a contemporary twist that only these talented chefs can create.Throughout the evening, embark on a culinary journey that feels both modern and nostalgic. The menu draws inspiration from generations-old recipe books of the Gomes Pereira and Prazeres households, infusing the meal with the essence of Goa's rich history.Experience the magic as these two friends take contemporary Goan cuisine in a new direction, delivering a heartwarming and memorable dining experience that pays tribute to their shared roots and innovative spirit.Set MenuNOTE: Seafood allergies & gluten can be accommodatedNon- Veg Menu                                          Bread Course:Coriander Chilli Lime/Goan Sausage ButterCourse 1:                                                     OLMI                                                                    Grilled morels & truffle.Course 2:GRILLED TIGER PRAWNSRecheado seafood bisqueCourse 3:ROAST BEEF CROQUETTASGarlic paprika yoghurtCourse 4:PAN ROASTED FISHKalchi kodi, turmeric mash, onion fennel saladCourse 5:BEEF TENDERLIONOnion sauce, pepper jus, pomme frittesCOURSE 6:PASTEIS DE NATAPortuguese custard tartVeg Menu  Bread Course:Coriander Chilli LimeCourse 1:                                                     OLMI                                                                    Grilled morels & truffleCourse 2: GRILLED BROCCOLIGarlic butter & dill yoghurtCourse 3:JACKFRUIT CROQUETTASGarlic paprika yoghurtCourse 4:GRILLED WHITE ASPARAGUS & PALM HEARTKalchi kodi, turmeric mash, puffed brown riceCourse 5:TAMBDI BHAJI LASAGNAparmesan , goats cheese, caramelised walnutsCourse 6:PASTEIS DE NATAPortuguese custard tartTerms and Conditions : The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventDo not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.Children aged 7 and above require a ticket to attend the meal. If you are bringing a child under 7, please inform us in advance, as we do not have a baby seat at the venue.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Management will entertain no liability or claims arising due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

name: intro to letterpress
description: A workshop to get to know about letterpress - history, process and craft of printing by hand on an antique press. The session will focus on hand setting the metal type the old fashioned way, making a composition and printing your own piece of typographic art.Beginner level workshop.No prior experience required

location.name: printingwithtypes
location.address: 221, 11th Cross Rd, near Bommanahalli, GPK layout, Hosapalaya, Muneshwara Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068, India

name: Letterpress poster printing
description: The art of poster making with your own hands. A fun session to unleash your creative minds, experiment with typographic layout and using  types.Bring along a favourite quote, song lyric or poem perhaps and with our guidance, you can make a fabulous poster print for your wall. We recommend no more than  5 words.Details- Create a poster / print for your wall- Suitable for graphic designers, design enthusiasts, printmakers, type lovers, anyone who wants to create a print with your own handsAll materials required would be provided. You will make two copies of the poster print in A4 size.

name: The Dakshin Soirée with Dr. Darshan Gowda
description: Join us for an enchanting Chef's Table in a community-style experience that brings Malnad cuisine to life. This exclusive event takes you on a journey through Karnataka's rich culinary traditions, where age-old recipes meet fresh, local ingredients. Set amidst a vibrant, lush backdrop, our Chef's Table captures the essence of home and tradition. Savour traditional vegetarian and vegan Karnataka dishes like Pathrode, Rice, Hayagreeva, and Mavina Sasuve, meticulously prepared to highlight authentic regional flavours. Indulge in a feast that celebrates the warmth, hospitality, and rich heritage of Malnad, with Dr Darshan's specially curated all-veg and vegan menu making it perfect for food enthusiasts and culture lovers alike. It will be a community-style table seating. Elder & LGBTQ friendly.Cuisine Description:Malnad cuisine, from Karnataka's lush Malnad region, highlights fresh, local ingredients and traditional cooking techniques like steaming, slow cooking, and stone grinding. Known for its rich, vibrant flavours, the cuisine reflects the region's diverse communities, including Havyaka Brahmins, Vokkaligas, and Gowdas. Food habits emphasize seasonal and local produce, primarily vegetarian. Staples like coconut, rice, and jaggery are common. Malnad cuisine is a culinary journey that embodies the essence of home, tradition, and the warm hospitality of the Western Ghats.Who am I?I’m Dr Darshan Gowda, a dentist turned home chef with a deep passion for reviving age-old, traditional recipes. My culinary journey began in my childhood, watching and assisting my mom and grandmother in the kitchen, which fueled my love for cooking. I specialize in Malnad cuisine and coastal recipes, focusing on vegan and vegetarian dishes. Exploring hidden culinary gems and recreating traditional flavours is my true passion, and I aim to bring the essence of these home-cooked meals to life.https://www.instagram.com/dr.darshangowda/Venue: Love OORU﻿Rooftop / Sunsets / Wine & Grills ﻿https://www.instagram.com/love.ooru/?hl=en

location.name: love OORU
location.address: No. 136, Evergreen PARC, Rooftop, 1st Cross Road, 5th Block,, Koramangala, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: love OORU
organizer.description: love.OORU is a tranquil oasis on the rooftop which is the perfect setting for enjoying beautiful sunsets, hosting private dinners & events, and maybe indulging in a chef's table experience.  Taking inspiration from Bengaluru, her history, geography, culture, and most importantly her stories, love.OORU was born as an identity rooted in Bengaluru and all it has to offer.

name: Sunset Pilates and sharing spread with Aakruti
description: Come join us for a Sundowner Pilates class this weekend at The Studio by the Copper + Cloves with Aakruti.Mat Pilates is a form of exercise that focuses on strengthening the body's core muscles (abdominals, lower back, hips, and buttocks) while also targeting other areas of the body through controlled movements. As the sun sets, immerse yourself in a session designed to strengthen, stretch, and restore balance to both body and mind.After the class, you can experience our local, well-balanced, nutritious and seasonal menu spread. A beautiful way to get to know your peers in our serene space at The Studio.

location.name: Copper + Cloves

name: Bengal to Table | Sienna, Calcutta at The Conservatory
description: Sienna, Calcutta at The ConservatorySienna is back in Bangalore this July from the 19th to the 21st with both the kitchen and store teams popping up at the Courtyard. Taking inspiration from the baajars of Bengal, this will be an immersive showcase of both food and design craft.About the mealAfter a well-received baajar-to-table tasting menu at the Conservatory earlier in the year the kitchen team from Sienna helmed by Chefs Avinandan and Koyel are back with an ala carte menu of casual, sharing plates reflecting the best of the bounty of Bengal’s culture and produce. They aim to focus on the bajaars of the region and the menu reflects the seasonality and diversity of the region coupled with techniques from across the globe.Menu:Chola’r Daal Hummus, Nimki (V) - Rs. 450Mushroom XO Rice, King Oyster Jerky (V) - Rs. 550Potol Poshto, Khosha Bata, Golabhaat (V) - Rs. 550Ranga Aloo & Pumpkin Gnocchi, Bonolokhi Ghee Sauce (V) - Rs. 650Chana’r Paturi, Aam Kasundi (V) - Rs. 550Beef Tartare, Kalabhuna (NV) - Rs. 750Maach’r Dim XO Rice, Fried Egg (NV) - Rs. 550Kalojeere Pork, Golabhaat (V)* - Rs. 650Crab Meat, Deshi Deem, Crab Caramel (NV) - Rs. 750Golda Chingri, Ghilu Hollandaise (NV) - Rs. 750Duck, Jhol, Chaaler Ruti (NV) - Rs. 750Bhetki a la Kiev, Radhuni Butter, Mash (NV) - Rs. 750Aam Doi, Coconut Cream, Lemon Basil (V) - Rs. 450Malai Toast Brûlée (V) - Rs. 450*Contains Egg. Other offerings at the Sienna, Calcutta ExperienceThe Pottery Workshop at The Yard*Book your spot for the workshop separately. Through the link on @thecourtyardcommunity 's Instagram bio. Travelling with Sienna, Calcutta from their workshop in Santiniketan are senior members of our team who will co-host ceramic workshops for both kids and adults throughout the duration of the residency.The Pop-up shop at The Studio*The pop-up shop is free to access. Named after the colour of the local red soil / রাঙামাটি of Santiniketan, Sienna was born out of a deep appreciation of the rich craft heritage of Bengal. Our creative nerve centre is in Daronda village, Shantiniketan, about 200 km from Calcutta, surrounded by lush greenery, where in 1993 architect & founder Shanta Ghosh built a pottery workshop to support local artisans from the neighbouring areas. Her daughter, now creative head Shuli, took over around 12 years ago. They built the store space in Calcutta in 2015 along with a small family run cafe with home staff trained to serve soups, salads and sandwiches. That space evolved over time, especially since the pandemic, and brought the same level of focus and support to food craft, as they had initially for ceramics and textiles. Today Sienna is a design company proudly representing the finest traditional craft techniques of Bengal and bringing it to a national and global stage for engagement with a wider audience.The craft residency at the Courtyard will be a comprehensive and experiential showcase of the various craft mediums we work with. From handmade pottery, copper & brass jewellery made with upcycled fabric waste to textiles made with natural fibres and printed with motifs inspired by all things Bengal.Terms and Conditions : The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an event.The access to the pop- up shop is free. The pop-up store is open from 11am to 10pm. Ticket price of 1200 is redeemable against food only.Please note that the same kitchen will be used to prepare both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food.Do not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.Children aged 5 and above require a ticket to attend the meal.Let the Conservatory team know in advance if you are bringing a child below the age of 5 (without a ticket). An extra chair will be provided at the table for the child.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Management will entertain no liability or claims arising due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

name: Pottery Workshop for Beginners (1- Day Workshop) | Sienna, Calcutta at Courtyard
description: About the workshopEnjoy an exclusive, hands-on experience with 2 trainers for every 6 participants. Traveling with us from our workshop in Santiniketan are senior potters from the Sienna, Calcutta family, who will co-host pottery workshops for both kids and adults throughout the residency.Play with claySienna, Calcutta's senior potters from the Santiniketan will teach the basics of hand-building, pinch, coil & slab pottery. You will be able to create objects, shapes & forms, without using a potter’s wheel - all you need are your hands and some fun shaping & coiling tools which we will provide. A fun session to let you unleash your imagination and creativity and make something unique.For Beginners (Children between 5 yrs - 12 years) & adults with young heartsDuration: 2 hoursTerms & ConditionsThe management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventPlease be on time for your slot.Do not purchase the tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.The schedule and the menu are subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.For Beginners (Children between 5 yrs - 12 years) & adults with young hearts - Children can be accompanied by one adult.No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at 200RS per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval of theirs.

name: Advanced Pottery Workshop (3- Day Workshop) | Sienna, Calcutta at Courtyard
description: PLEASE NOTE:The Workshop will take place over three- days. About the workshopEnjoy an exclusive, hands-on experience with 2 trainers for every 6 participants. Traveling with us from our workshop in Santiniketan are senior potters from the Sienna, Calcutta family, who will co-host pottery workshops for both kids and adults throughout the residency.Shape, throw & mould!19th July - Day 1Our master potter & senior designer, and Senior glazing expert will give an introduction to hand-thrown pottery and ceramic arts. We will go through each stage of the pottery-making process with visual aids. We will start by teaching to wedge the clay and then throw on the potter’s wheel and finally learn to centre it.20th July - Day 2Shape and mould the clay and create various forms using hands and making handles, learning slab, coil and hand-building techniques. They will teach the group how to pull and push the clay body as desired to create various shapes & forms. Surface carving and decorating techniques.21st July - Day 3:Working on perfecting the shapes and sizes, controlling the forms, and continuing to practice throwing.for Intermediate level pottery experienceAge requirement: Over the age of 12 yearsDuration: 2 hoursTime: 11 am - 1 pmTerms & ConditionsThe management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventPlease be on time for your slot.Do not purchase the tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.The schedule and the menu are subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at 200RS per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval of theirs.

name: Friday Adda (Drinks & Conversations with Strangers)
description: Join us for an evening of laughter, conversation, and the chance to make new friends over your favorite drinks. From craft beers to spirits, you have a lots of options available.Whether you're new in town, looking to expand your social circle, or simply curious about meeting new people, all are welcome to join us for a memorable evening of camaraderie and connection.So come raise a glass with us and toast to the joys of spontaneity and the thrill of new encounters. Who knows what delightful conversations and meaningful connections await? Let's make this a night to remember! We can't wait to see you on Friday.

name: Bombay Style Breakfast with Strangers.
description: Welcome to our Bombay Breakfast Table, where the day begins with delicious food and delightful conversation! Nestled in the heart of Bangalore, our gathering offers a warm and inviting atmosphere to kick-start your morning on a high note.As you step into our cozy venue, take a seat and indulge in a hearty breakfast spread. In essence, a Bombay-style breakfast is a delightful amalgamation of flavors and culinary traditions, offering something for every palate, from savory to sweet, light to hearty.But our Bombay Breakfast Table is about more than just the food – it's about fostering connections and building community. Strike up a conversation with fellow attendees as you sip on your favorite morning brew, sharing stories, ideas, and laughter in the company of like-minded individuals.Whether you're here to network, unwind, or simply enjoy a delicious meal, our Bombay Breakfast Table promises a welcoming environment where you can start your day off right. So grab a plate, pour yourself a cup of cutting chai, and join us as we toast to new beginnings and the simple joy of good food and great company. Cheers to a wonderful morning ahead!

name: Cocktails with Strangers
description: Looking to spice up your social life and meet some interesting new people? Look no further! You're cordially invited to our upcoming Cocktails with Strangers Table, where you can enjoy great drinks, engaging conversations, and make meaningful connections with fellow adventurers like yourself.Whether you're new in town, looking to expand your social circle, or simply enjoy meeting new people, this event is perfect for you. There's no pressure, just good vibes and good company.

name: Sunday Breakfast with Strangers
description: Are you ready to start your day with a delightful twist? We’re hosting a Breakfast with Strangers Table, and we’d love for you to join us!At the Breakfast Table, we believe in the power of connecting with new faces over a delicious meal. It’s a chance to step out of your comfort zone, spark interesting conversations, and maybe even make some new friends along the way.Whether you’re new to the city, looking to expand your social circle, or simply enjoy meeting new people, this table is perfect for you. We’ll provide the food, the cozy ambiance, and plenty of conversation starters.All you need to bring is yourself and an open mind!
